text: Dracohors is a group in taxonomy, the system scientists use to put living things in groups. It is below a phylum but above an order. It is a clade. The clade Dracohors contains dinosaurs, birds and Silesauridae. The name dracohors comes from Latin: draco for "dragon" and hors for "group" or "circle." ==Related pages== *Dinosaurs *List of dinosaurs *Dinosaur brains and intelligence *K/T extinction event ==References== Category:Dinosaurs Category:Taxonomy
title: Dracohors
